description: This file defines classes for interacting with the Zep memory and graph API, including both synchronous and asynchronous tools. It includes methods for initializing clients, adding messages, retrieving memory, and searching the Zep graph, with detailed handling of session and user IDs.

classes.name: ZepTools
classes.description: Synchronous toolkit class for interacting with Zep API, managing sessions, users, messages, memory retrieval, and graph search.

classes.name: ZepAsyncTools
classes.description: Asynchronous toolkit class for interacting with Zep API, with async methods for session management, messaging, memory, and graph search.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the Zep client, sets up session and user IDs, and handles client connection.

methods.name: add_zep_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the current Zep session memory.

methods.name: get_zep_memory
methods.description: Retrieves the memory (context, messages, relevant facts) for the current session.

methods.name: search_zep_memory
methods.description: Searches the Zep graph for relevant facts or nodes based on a query.
